description: Where can a guy like Kiern Duecan go for advice and comfort, if not to his trusted friends, Krave Moore and Jin Powers. Then they switch so Krave can do some rimming on Kiern and Jin can feel Kiern's warm lips on his throbbing member.  Then the time comes for Kiern to experience the ultimate.  Jin and Krave take turns slamming Kiern's sweet, eager ass, switching off at both ends so Kiern can be adequately filled with hot, Ebony meat.  This is a bachelor party you won't soon forget!  Enjoy!
title: Best Men
